definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: The most interesting thing was to climb the Fragrant Mount.
sentences.chinese: 最有趣的事情莫过于爬香山了。

sentences.english: The Way of the Dragon God believes that the heart, more than anything else, points the way forward.
sentences.chinese: 龙神道相信指引方向的最大力量莫过于心。

sentences.english: Now, I am half snake, half woman-the worst of all possible worlds.
sentences.chinese: 如今我半蛇半女，世间最痛苦的，莫过于此。

sentences.english: The most threatening change, from my perspective, is extermination of species.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，威胁最大的莫过于物种的灭绝。

sentences.english: Nothing is worse than the death of conscience.
sentences.chinese: 一个人最伤心的事莫过于良心的死灭。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing was to climb the Golden Hill.
sentences.chinese: 最有趣的事情莫过于爬金山了。

sentences.english: There is nothing so beautiful as the creation of a new life.
sentences.chinese: 世间最美好的事，莫过于新生命的诞生。

sentences.english: There's no greater happiness than that of succeeding in one's career.
sentences.chinese: 最大的快乐莫过于事业上的成功。

sentences.english: Today researchers are most excited by ginger's ability to combat inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 现在，研究人员最激动莫过于姜的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: The best data is that which is tied to Nesta and Maldini's recovery.
sentences.chinese: 最好的小厮莫过于内斯塔和马尔蒂尼的回归了。

sentences.english: The biggest handheld-related news lately has been about VGA screens.
sentences.chinese: 最近关于手持设备最火一条新闻莫过于VGA屏幕了。

sentences.english: That is the worst thing that you can do.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的事情莫过于此。

sentences.english: I am going to get everything ready beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法莫过于早作准备。

sentences.english: One of the great tortures of life is receiving grades on papers and tests.
sentences.chinese: 生活中最折磨人的事情莫过于收取考试成绩单。

sentences.english: There is simply no other possession, anyone could hold, more precious than this.
sentences.chinese: 人们所能拥有的最珍贵的礼物莫过于此了。

sentences.english: There is no more precious possession anyone could hold.
sentences.chinese: 人们所能拥有的最珍贵的礼物莫过于此了。

definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
can be rated as/can be said to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
